Sentra PM- two capsule give orally daily thirty minute bedtime 30 day . To measure improvement quality life determine change short form-36 ( SF-36 ) general health survey . Improvements daytime sleepiness determine Epworth Sleepiness Scale ( ESS ) , improvement cognitive emotional function use Cognitive emotion regulation questionnaire - short ( CERQ-Short ) , change PTSD symptom Primary Care - PTSD ( PC-PTSD ) , Psychopathy Checklist- Military ( PCL-M ) . Heart rate variability ( HRV ) data variation measure group twenty subject .
